Module project
Package project.audio

Class SoundPlayer

java.lang.Object
project.audio.SoundPlayer
public class SoundPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
JavaFX MediaPlayer initialization This class will play any BackgroundSound-(Looped) and any SoundEffect-(Not Looped) in the players preferred volume.

    • playSoundEffect

      public javafx.scene.media.MediaPlayer playSoundEffect​(java.lang.String filename)
      This method will play a background sound from a given filename (without .mp3 extension) - doesn't loop
      Parameters:
      filename - of resource file.
      Returns:
      initialized MediaPlayer to stop a soundEffect from playing if needed.

      isLooped - if sound has to loop endlessly.
